name: Guake
description:
Guake is a quake-like platformer made in the Godot engine, so expect to bunny hop and rocket jump your way, up to places.

The game currently only has some testing levels, as I did not have enough time (and skills) to make any good levels,

This game was made for the mini-jam-67 in 72 hours.

Source code: https://gitlab.com/the-fiddling-fiddlers/mini_jam_67

Controls are wasd to move, space to jump, ctrl to crouch, and left mouse to shoot.

This game was made on Gentoo linux, and the windows version has only been tested using a translation layer (wine) so please let me know if something isn't working!

for osx, i could not test this version at all, so again, please let me know if it does not work!
